title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.34 - NO CENTER LINE Sign (W8-12)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.34 - NO CENTER LINE Sign (W8-12)

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 01A Where the center line does not exist for a distance of
1000 feet or longer, the W8-12 sign should be supplemented with a Distance
plaque (see Section
2C.55
). Where additional signs are
placed within 1000 feet of the end of the no center line condition, the

Distance plaque should be omitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
